summary: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, falls in love with a beautiful heiress but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated.
cast: Phillips Holmes|Sylvia Sidney|Frances Dee|Irving Pichel|Frederick Burton|Claire McDowell|Wallace Middleton|Emmett Corrigan|Charles Middleton|Lucille La Verne|Al Hart|Fanny Midgley|Arnold Korff|Russ Powell|William Bailey|Ed Brady|Martin Cichy|Richard Cramer|Sidney D'Albrook|Claire Dodd|Robert Dudley|James Durkin|Elizabeth Forrester|Sherry Hall|George Irving|Arline Judge|Harry Leroy|Guy Oliver|Franklin Parker|Imboden Parrish|Evelyn Pierce|Ronald R. Rondell|Matty Roubert|Harry Schultz|Harry Semels|Harry Stubbs|Nella Walker|Vivian Winston
director: Director: Josef von Sternberg (as Josef Von Sternberg)
title: Una tragedia humana
